description: Please change all references to rackspace in the code to openstack.  This includes modules, directories and comments, but not the xmlns, which would break clients.
title: Change all references to Rackspace in the API code to Openstack

comments.content: Please change all references to rackspace in the code to openstack.  This includes modules, directories and comments, but not the xmlns, which would break clients.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dendrobates

comments.content: I think this missed some references to 'rsapi' and 'rs'.  I'll get those.
